title: Ubisoft Is Stealing DLC From People That Bought It
description:
Just when you thought Ubisoft and modern gaming couldn’t get any worse, it surprises you with a quick jab in the eye, sand in the face, and not even the courtesy of a “how do you do”.


Delisting games is bizarre to begin with, but taking away DLC is just…oof.

Thank you for nothing, Ubisoft.
